item.description:
Happy Birthday America! What could be more FUN than celebrating our patriotism along with our Favorite Pooches! Join us this Sunday July 15th from 1:00pm to 3:00pm. Enjoy watching your Best Friend exercise & socialize in a Safe Enclosed area with fun activities to Entertain them! We'll have Bobbing for kongs, Hula Hoop Jumping, The Splashy Pool and much more! We can't wait to see everyone again to catch up on how your summer is going. Chose from AirConditioned Climate Controlled Inside Play or Fenced in Flea & Tick FREE Outside Play! Special Treat for Dogs Dressed In Patriotic Colors! Hope to See you Soon!

Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Patriotic Pet Play Date
